description: Wrestling takedown shooting for both legs to take opponent down
key_points: Level change explosively|Penetration step|Shoulder in hip at 45 degrees|Head on outside to avoid guillotine
common_mistakes: Head inside (guillotine)|No level change|Slow penetration|Poor finishing

description: Wrestling takedown attacking one leg with various finishes available
key_points: Penetration step|Secure leg behind knee|Head inside or outside|Finish with trip or lift
common_mistakes: Slow|Loose grip|Poor head position|Standing up too early

description: Single leg variation with head inside attacking inner thigh
key_points: Level change|Head inside position|Control at thigh|Finish with lift or trip

description: Takedown grabbing ankle while steering opponent down with upper body
key_points: Collar tie or grip|Pull posture down|Level change grab ankle|Steer down with upper control

description: Single leg finish driving shoulder through while running around opponent
key_points: Secure single leg|Drive shoulder into hip|Run around toward captured leg|Take down at angle

description: Snapping opponent's head down from collar tie to front headlock
key_points: From collar tie|Pull head down sharply|Step back creating angle|Secure front headlock
common_mistakes: Not stepping back|Weak pull|Poor timing|Opponent posturing

description: From front headlock circling behind opponent for back take or takedown
key_points: From front headlock|Circle behind opponent|Establish control|Take down or take back

description: Judo throw reaping outside leg while driving backward with upper body
key_points: Grip at collar and sleeve|Step outside opponent's leg|Reap leg while driving back|Follow to top
common_mistakes: Poor timing|Weak reap|No upper drive|Off balance

description: Judo throw reaping inside lead leg while driving forward
key_points: Control at collar and sleeve|Step inside|Reap inner leg backward|Drive forward to complete

description: Judo foot sweep hooking ankle or heel from inside
key_points: Hook ankle from inside|Pull with upper body|Timing as opponent steps|Off-balance to complete
common_mistakes: Poor timing|Weak hook|No upper pull|Wrong foot

description: Classic judo shoulder throw with 180 degree turn loading opponent on shoulder
key_points: Turn in 180 degrees|Load on shoulder and hip|Pull and lift|Throw over shoulder
common_mistakes: Not turning enough|No kuzushi|Poor loading|Off balance self

description: Hip throw sweeping opponent's leg while rotating over hip
key_points: Hip below opponent's center|Sweep leg with back of leg|Pull strongly|Throw over hip
common_mistakes: Hip too high|Weak sweep|No pull|Off balance

description: Advanced judo throw sweeping inner thigh with strong upper body pull
key_points: Lift inner thigh with leg|Strong pull with hands|Pivot and sweep|Complete throw rotation
common_mistakes: Weak sweep|No pull|Poor timing|Off balance self

description: Judo throw stepping across to block and drop opponent over leg
key_points: Step across opponent|Leg blocks their leg|Pull them over your leg|Complete throw with rotation

description: Sacrifice throw placing foot on hip and rolling back to throw opponent overhead
key_points: Foot on hip|Roll back pulling opponent|Throw overhead|Follow to mount or guard

description: Sacrifice throw similar to butterfly sweep from standing hooking inner thigh
key_points: Hook inner thigh|Roll back|Throw to side|Follow to top position

description: Judo foot sweep timing sweep as opponent advances and steps
key_points: Time as opponent steps|Sweep advancing foot|Pull with upper body|Complete off-balance

description: Sitting to guard position from standing to engage ground game
key_points: Secure grips first|Sit down quickly|Immediately engage guard|Control with hooks/grips

description: Guard pull using collar and sleeve grips with foot on hip
key_points: Collar and sleeve grips|Foot on hip|Sit back with tension|Immediately attack

description: Jumping to wrap legs around standing opponent (high injury risk)
key_points: Secure grips|Jump and wrap legs|Lock guard immediately|Begin attacks

description: Guard pull immediately hooking into De La Riva position
key_points: Grips established|Sit and immediately hook DLR|Control ankle|Attack from DLR

description: Wrestling/judo takedown loading opponent on shoulders and throwing
key_points: Level change|Load on shoulders|Control arm and leg|Throw to side

description: Using arm drag to get behind opponent for takedown or back take
key_points: Grip at wrist and tricep|Drag arm across body|Get behind opponent|Complete takedown or back

description: Going under opponent's arm to get behind from clinch
key_points: From collar tie|Duck under arm|Get behind opponent|Complete takedown

description: Quick takedown tapping behind knee while steering with upper body
key_points: Control at collar/head|Tap behind knee|Steer opponent down|Follow to top
